NODE.title: htmlpage edit page
NODE.field:
Title:[{nodeFormObject: TextField, title}] [% $this->listNodetypeFields( $this->get_node->get_pagetype_nodetype ) %]
Owner: [{nodeFormObject: AuthorMenu, author_user}]
Pagetype: [{nodeFormObject: NodetypeMenu, pagetype_nodetype, pagetype}]
displaytype: [{nodeFormObject: TextField, displaytype, thedisplaytype}]
MIME type: [{nodeFormObject: TextField, MIMEtype}]
Parent container: [% $this->nodeFormObject( 'TypeMenu', 'parent_container', 'parentContainer', 'container', 'AUTO', $this->get_user, 'r', 0 ) %]
Theme: [% $this->nodeFormObject( 'TypeMenu', 'ownedby_theme', 'theme', 'theme', 'AUTO', $this->get_user, 'r', 0 ) %]
Permission needed: [% my $NODE = $this->get_node; my $USER = $this->get_user; my $query = $this->get_query; my $THEME = $this->get_theme; my %HTMLVARS = %{ $this->get_htmlvars }; my $VARS = $this->get_vars; my $DB = $this->get_nodebase; my %GLOBAL; my $menu = newFormObject('FormMenu'); my $html = $menu->genObject($query, $NODE, "permissionneeded", "permissionneeded"); $menu->addHash({ 'r' => "read", "w" => "write", "x" => "execute", "d" => "delete", "c" => "create"}, 0, 'labels'); $html .= $menu->genPopupMenu($query, "permissionneeded", $$NODE{permissionneeded}); $html; %]
Edit the page:
[{nodeFormObject: TextArea, page, page, AUTO, 80, 20, off}]
[{submit}]
